imposter-prime-suspect.question: Things you would do for a million
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Things you would refuse to do no matter the price,, Things someone could offer money for that you'd hesitate to admit,, Things you'd only do if nobody ever found out

imposter-prime-suspect.question: Worst people to ever exist
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Most admirable people to ever exist,, People history gives too much credit,, People whose actions would get them cancelled instantly today

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What game do you wish was real life
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What fictional world you’d never want to live in,, What game would become horrifying in real life,, What fictional universe you'd accidentally die in immediately

imposter-prime-suspect.question: Supervillain that was lowkey justified
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A villain who absolutely had no justification,, A villain whose motives you secretly understand,, A villain who would actually win in real life

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What crime would you commit if it meant it would never happen again
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What crime you would never commit under any circumstance,, What morally grey action you'd reluctantly take for a greater good,, What law you’d break quietly if guaranteed zero consequences

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the maximum age gap you would be fine with dating
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: An age gap you would never tolerate,, The age gap you think most people secretly accept,, The age gap that would instantly make things look suspicious

imposter-prime-suspect.question: Valid reasons to crashout
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Valid reasons to stay calm no matter what,, Reasons people snap that you lowkey relate to,, Situations where acting unhinged is somehow understandable

imposter-prime-suspect.question: Most horrific event in human history
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Most inspiring moment in human history,, Historical events people underestimate the severity of,, Events that would cause society to collapse instantly today

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the worst crime you think could be morally justified
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What’s the most harmless thing that still feels morally wrong,, A decision people judge harshly but you secretly understand,, A crime you could defend under extremely specific circumstances

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something illegal that shouldn’t be illegal
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something legal that absolutely shouldn’t be,, Something society enforces that makes no sense,, A rule you break even though you know you're technically not supposed to

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the biggest necessary evil
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What’s something unnecessary that people pretend is essential,, Something society relies on but shouldn’t,, Something you accept only because rejecting it makes life harder

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What would you do for a billion that you wouldn’t do for a million
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What wouldn’t you do even for a billion,, Something you'd never admit you'd consider for money,, Something you'd only do for a billion if your life depended on it

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the coldest breakup reason
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What’s the kindest breakup reason,, A breakup reason that sounds reasonable but hits too hard,, A breakup reason that would make everyone gasp at how cruel it is

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the worst thing you’d do to save someone you love
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something you’d refuse to do no matter who it was for,, A sacrifice you’d reluctantly make in a life-or-death situation,, A moral line you'd cross only if nobody knew why

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What famous figure deserves forgiveness the least
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What famous figure deserves more forgiveness than they get,, A public figure who gets too much praise,, A famous person whose redemption arc would never work

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something harmless that would put you on a “sus list” instantly?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What’s something suspicious that actually has an innocent explanation,, An action that looks sketchy but you do without thinking,, Something you do that would get you side-eyed immediately

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a perfectly legal thing that still feels illegal?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: What illegal thing feels surprisingly harmless,, What normal action gives you anxiety despite being allowed,, What rule-following action still feels like you're breaking something

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a sacrifice that isn’t worth making, even for someone you love?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A sacrifice that is always worth making for someone you love,, A boundary you'd set that others might disagree with,, A line you refuse to cross no matter the emotional pressure

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a scenario where lying is absolutely the right call?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A scenario where honesty is always required,, A lie that does more good than harm,, A truth that would cause chaos if spoken out loud

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a rule you’d break if you knew nobody would ever find out?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A rule you'd never break even with guaranteed secrecy,, A rule people pretend to follow but secretly don’t,, A rule you'd break just to see what happens

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s the smallest red flag that would still get you ejected?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: The biggest red flag you’d overlook,, A tiny behavior that instantly ruins your trust,, A small action that tells you something is deeply wrong

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a temptation you’re not confident you could resist?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A temptation you can resist easily,, A temptation everyone claims they’d resist but wouldn’t,, A temptation that would expose your true personality instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something you would never joke about?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something you joke about way too often,, Something people joke about that you can’t find funny,, Something that becomes unfunny the moment it's said out loud

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a type of suffering you find genuinely hard to watch?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A type of suffering you can tolerate without flinching,, A type of discomfort that makes you cringe instantly,, A kind of suffering that would break you in seconds

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a behavior that instantly gives you the ick?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A behavior you find attractive for no reason,, A behavior that everyone else overlooks but you can’t,, A behavior that makes you reconsider everything about someone

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something that instantly makes you uncomfortable?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something that instantly relaxes you,, Something others enjoy but creeps you out,, Something that triggers your fight-or-flight instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a quality that makes someone a good friend?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A trait that makes someone a terrible friend,, A quality you value more than most people realize,, A friend trait that seems good but is secretly toxic

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a red flag that’s impossible to ignore?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A red flag you always ignore,, A red flag people pretend isn’t a red flag,, A behavior that quietly screams ‘run’

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a moment where selfishness is 100% justified?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A moment where selfishness is never acceptable,, A moment where everyone secretly chooses themselves,, A moment where choosing others would actually ruin everything

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a belief you hold that would get you side-eyed instantly?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A belief you hold that everyone agrees with,, A belief people pretend not to have,, A belief that exposes your villain arc immediately

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a character flaw you secretly think is kinda valid?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A character flaw you can't excuse at all,, A flaw you wish you didn't relate to,, A flaw that becomes a strength in the right situation

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a “harmless” act that instantly makes you look untrustworthy?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A suspicious act that is actually trustworthy,, An act people misinterpret constantly,, An act that reveals more about someone than they intend

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a limit you hope you never have to test?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A limit you’ve already tested,, A limit you think most people underestimate,, A limit that would change who you are forever

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something that feels like a red flag only when YOU do it?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something you excuse in yourself but not in others,, Something you hate doing but do anyway,, Something that makes you judge yourself instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a belief you’d defend even if everyone disagreed?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A belief you'd drop instantly under pressure,, A belief you keep to yourself because people wouldn’t get it,, A belief that would start an argument instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a situation where you’d choose chaos over peace?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A situation where you always choose peace,, A situation where chaos is secretly the smart option,, A situation where peace would actually ruin everything

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a scenario where being TOO calm is a red flag?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A scenario where calmness is essential,, A moment where staying calm makes you look guilty,, A moment where calmness feels unnatural or threatening

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a moment where apologizing makes things worse?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A moment where apologizing fixes everything,, A moment where an apology feels manipulative,, A moment where silence would’ve saved you

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a rule you follow only because it benefits you?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A rule you follow even though it hurts you,, A rule people pretend is fair but isn’t,, A rule you’d rewrite instantly if given power

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a moment where staying quiet is borderline evil?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A moment where staying quiet is the right thing,, A moment where speaking up makes everything worse,, A moment where silence exposes your real intentions

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a harmless lie you think everyone tells?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A truth people say even when it hurts,, A lie people believe out of convenience,, A lie that causes chaos when taken seriously

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a fear you think only normal people have?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A fear you think is irrational,, A fear people downplay but is actually serious,, A fear you'd never admit unless pressured

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a behavior that feels innocent but is secretly manipulative?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A behavior that looks manipulative but isn’t,, A behavior people excuse too often,, A behavior that reveals hidden agendas instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a situation that brings out the worst version of you?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A situation that brings out the best version of you,, A situation you pretend you're good at handling but aren't,, A situation that exposes your darkest impulses

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a “just in case” habit that makes you look unhinged?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A habit that makes you look overly normal,, A habit people assume is harmless until they think about it,, A habit that reveals you're way more paranoid than you admit

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a situation where trying too hard makes you look suspicious?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A situation where maximum effort looks admirable,, A situation where effort hides insecurity,, A situation where being chill is the only safe option

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something you’d never admit you enjoy?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something you'd proudly admit you enjoy,, Something people secretly enjoy but won't say out loud,, Something you'd deny even if caught doing it

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a trait you admire even though you shouldn’t?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A trait you dislike even though you shouldn’t,, A trait you pretend not to admire,, A trait you'd develop if morality didn’t exist

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a choice where both options make you look bad?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A choice where both options make you look good,, A choice where people judge you no matter what,, A choice you'd avoid making until the last second

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s something you worry would corrupt you instantly if you ever tasted it?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: Something you know would never affect you,, Something you'd get addicted to embarrassingly fast,, Something that would unlock your villain arc instantly

imposter-prime-suspect.question: What’s a thought you immediately hide the second it appears?
imposter-prime-suspect.question-alternatives: A thought you overshare too quickly,, A thought everyone has but nobody admits,, A thought that would change how people see you forever
